en.name: Recruiting
en.coverDescription: This course will give you the skills you need to conduct an effective recruitment interview. A selection interview is a bit like detective work. Suspects must be eliminated until the right person is found. Making the right selection choice means knowing the budget was spent well, a valuable asset has been acquired and that colleagues will be motivated by the new team member. However, some get the costly decision wrong by making common mistakes.

fr.name: Réussir son recrutement
fr.coverDescription: Ce cours vous apportera les compétences nécessaires pour mener un entretien de recrutement efficace. Un entretien d'embauche est quelque peu similaire à un travail de détective. Les suspects doivent être éliminés jusqu'à ce que la bonne personne soit trouvée. Bien choisir son candidat signifie savoir que le budget a bien été dépensé, qu'un atout précieux a été acquis et que les collègues seront motivés par le nouveau membre de l'équipe.

de.name: Erfolgreiche Rekrutierung
de.coverDescription:
DEMNÄCHST BALD AUF DEUTSCH
This course will give you the skills you need to conduct an effective recruitment interview. A selection interview is a bit like detective work. Suspects must be eliminated until the right person is found. Making the right selection choice means knowing the budget was spent well, a valuable asset has been acquired and that colleagues will be motivated by the new team member. However, some get the costly decision wrong by making common mistakes.
